title: Amazing Adventures v1
description:
For the completionists out there...

This torrent includes Marvel Comics&#039; Amazing Adventures v1

This series from the 1970&#039;s featured the first solo-appearances of the Uncanny Inhumans (issues 1-10) as well as the Black Widow. The Beast, in his first solo feature and how Henry McCoy became the blue furred beast. The series closed with "War of the Worlds/Killraven Warrior of the Worlds."

This is supplemental history for the Inhumans, Avengers, Daredevil and X-men.

(I am just informed that issue#2 is missing the Black Widow story--- will follow-up with a fill when I locate it)

Thanks to the scanners and the original sources.

Please seed. Please Enjoy
